column6: You are stay in a private bedroom in our home for a night or longer term. Check out the in-room amenities! We are near a major bus stop for reaching the downtown Metro terminal. There are great and affordable restaurants in the area.\n\nWe have an outdoor dog. He is shifted between the garage and the backyard. We have a bearded dragon (very kid-friendly lizard) in an aquarium in the living room.
column9: Bedroom in Clear Lake Area Home
